info.title: What is the Holy Rosary?
info.intro: The Rosary is a traditional Catholic prayer that invites us to meditate on the life of Jesus and Mary. It is prayed by reflecting on different mysteries, each one representing a key moment in Salvation History.

structure.title: Structure of the Rosary
structure.text: The Rosary is made up of a sequence of prayers that accompany the meditation of each mystery.

info.mysteriesExplanation: Each group contains five mysteries. The group prayed depends on the day of the week.
